name: The Man with the Golden Joystick - featuring RetroHitch
name_original: The Man with the Golden Joystick - featuring RetroHitch
description:
The Man with the Golden Joystick, starring RetroHitch is a ZX Spectrum game, in the style of the classic platformers from back in the day.

The game is free, but if you do play & enjoy it, please consider making a small donation to the mental health charity Safe in our World: https://tiltify.com/@sloanysoft/sloanysoft-safe-in-our-world

You can watch & follow RetroHitch here: www.twitch.tv/retrohitch

A tape version will be available to buy in the coming weeks, with all profits to Safe in Our World, from the lovely folk at: www.phoenixware.co.uk
